item.title: Help (identifier) expected
item.dc:creator: @goblom10 goblom10
item.description:
@goblom10 wrote:

cmd is always giving me an error saying
jui.java:719: exected
new Xml.("findcatchedir() + “Files/all_IDs/Items.xml”);
jui.java:722: exected
new Xml.(“Files/all_IDs/Items.xml”);
jui.java:730: exected

new Xml.("findcatchedir() + “Files/all_IDs/Objects.xml”);
jui.java:755: exected
new Xml.(“Files/all_IDs/Objects.xml”);
8 errors
I dont get it what am i doing wrong? ive checked over it numerous times and nothing seems to be wrong
if you nee the files they are located at http://uppit.com/v/CQ48XCRM they were to big to upload to site (6.5 megabytes)

here is the code and file i am using

{
try
{
System.out.println(“connecting to update server”);

}
catch (Exception localException)
{
localException.printStackTrace();
}
}

public int test()

return 3;
}

public void initUI()
{
try
{
UIManager.setLookAndFeel(“org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel”);

  this.frame.getContentPane().add(localJPanel, "Center");
  this.frame.pack();
  this.frame.setVisible(true);
  init();
  midiPlayer("Play");
}
catch (Exception localException)
{
  localException.printStackTrace();
}

}

public JDialog createFileChooserDialog(JFileChooser paramJFileChooser, String paramString, Container paramContainer) {
JDialog localJDialog = new JDialog(this.frame, paramString, true);
localJDialog.setDefaultCloseOperation(2);

return localJDialog;
}

return;
}

{
System.out.println(paramObject.toString());
}

public static void chkDir(String paramString)
{
try {
File localFile = new File(paramString);
if (!(localFile.exists()))
localFile.mkdir();
}
catch (Exception localException)
{
log("Error making file: " + localException);
}
}

public void midiPlayer(String paramString) {
String str = “./User/music/”;
chkDir(str);
if ((this.player != null) && (this.player.isRunning()))
{
this.player.close();
}
if ((this.sequencer != null) && (this.sequencer.isRunning()))
{
this.sequencer.stop();
this.sequencer.close();
}
if (paramString.equals(“Next”))
{
this.midiCount += 1;
}
else if (paramString.equals(“Previous”))
{
this.midiCount -= 1;
}
if (paramString.equals(“Stop”))
return;
File localFile1 = new File(str);
String[] arrayOfString = localFile1.list();
if (arrayOfString.length > 0)
{
if (this.midiCount > arrayOfString.length - 1)
{
this.midiCount = 0;
}
if (this.midiCount < 0)
{
this.midiCount = (arrayOfString.length - 1);
}
if (arrayOfString[this.midiCount].endsWith(".mp3"))
{
log(“Playing " + arrayOfString[this.midiCount]);
this.player = new MP3Player(str + arrayOfString[this.midiCount], true);
} else {
if (!(arrayOfString[this.midiCount].endsWith(”.mid")))
return;
log("Playing " + arrayOfString[this.midiCount]);
try
{
File localFile2 = new File(str + arrayOfString[this.midiCount]);
this.sequencer = MidiSystem.getSequencer();
this.sequencer.setSequence(MidiSystem.getSequence(localFile2));
this.sequencer.setLoopCount(-1);
this.sequencer.open();
this.sequencer.start();
}
catch (MidiUnavailableException localMidiUnavailableException)
{
log(“Midi device unavailable!”);
}
catch (InvalidMidiDataException localInvalidMidiDataException)
{
log(“Invalid Midi data!”);
}
catch (IOException localIOException)
{
log(“I/O Error!”);
}
}
}
else {
log(“no midi or mp3 files in folder”);
}
}

public void takeScreenshot(boolean paramBoolean)
{
Object localObject;
BufferedImage localBufferedImage1;
try
{
Robot localRobot = new Robot();
Point localPoint = getLocationOnScreen();
localObject = new Rectangle(localPoint.x, localPoint.y, getWidth(), getHeight());
localBufferedImage1 = localRobot.createScreenCapture((Rectangle)localObject);
}
catch (Throwable localThrowable)
{
JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this.frame, “An error occured while trying to create a screenshot!”, “Screenshot Error”, 0);
return;
}
String str = null;
try
{
str = getNearestScreenshotFilename();
}
catch (IOException localIOException1)
{
if (paramBoolean)
{
JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this.frame, “A screenshot directory does not exist, and could not be created!”, “No Screenshot Directory”, 0);
return;
}
}
if ((str == null) && (paramBoolean))
{
JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this.frame, “There are too many screenshots in the screenshot directory!\nDelete some screen\nshots and try again.”, “Screenshot Directory Full”, 0);
return;
}
if (!(paramBoolean))
{
JFileChooser localJFileChooser1 = new JFileChooser();
localObject = createFileChooserDialog(localJFileChooser1, “Save Screenshot”, this);
BufferedImage localBufferedImage2 = localBufferedImage1;

localJFileChooser1.setFileSelectionMode(0);
localJFileChooser1.addChoosableFileFilter(new Gui.imageFileFilter());
localJFileChooser1.setCurrentDirectory(new File("./User/screenshots/"));
localJFileChooser1.setSelectedFile(new File(str));
JFileChooser localJFileChooser3 = localJFileChooser1;
localJFileChooser1.setDialogType(1);
localJFileChooser1.addActionListener(new ActionListener(localJFileChooser1, localBufferedImage2, (JDialog)localObject)
{
public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent paramActionEvent)
{
String str = paramActionEvent.getActionCommand();
if (str.equals(“ApproveSelection”))
{
File localFile = this.val$fileChooser.getSelectedFile();
if ((localFile != null) && (localFile.isFile()))
{
int i = JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(Gui.this.frame, localFile.getAbsolutePath() + " already exists.\nDo you want to replace it?", “Save Screenshot”, 2);
if (i != 0)
{
return;
}
}
try
{
ImageIO.write(this.val$si, “png”, localFile);
}
catch (IOException localIOException)
{
JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(Gui.this.frame, “An error occured while trying to save the screenshot!\nPlease make sure you have\n write access to the screenshot directory.”, “Screenshot Error”, 0);
}
this.val$fileDialog.dispose();
} else {
if (!(str.equals(“CancelSelection”)))
return;
this.val$fileDialog.dispose();
}

    }

  });
  ((JDialog)localObject).setVisible(true);
}
else
{
  try {
    ImageIO.write(localBufferedImage1, "png", new File("./User/screenshots/" + str));

    System.out.println("You took a screenshot!");
  }
  catch (IOException localIOException2)
  {
    JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this.frame, "An error occured while trying to save the screenshot!\nPlease make sure you have\n write access to the screenshot directory.", "Screenshot Error", 0);
  }
}

}

public static String getNearestScreenshotFilename()
throws IOException
{
File localFile = new File("./User/screenshots");
int i = 0;
do
{
String str = " .png";
if (i < 10)
{
str = str.replaceFirst(" “, “000” + i);
}
else if (i < 100)
{
str = str.replaceFirst(” “, “00” + i);
}
else if (i < 1000)
{
str = str.replaceFirst(” “, “0” + i);
}
else if (i < 10000)
{
str = str.replaceFirst(” ", " " + i);
}
if (new File(localFile, str).isFile())
{
++i;
}
else
return str;
}
while (i < 10000);
return null;
}

public URL getCodeBase()
{
try
{
System.out.println(“connected to update server”);
signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(this.Serverip));
return new URL(“http://www.xlinescape.net84.net/Updateserver/updater.hex”);
}
catch (Exception localException)

}

return super.getCodeBase();

}

}
